common

Class ClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.ClientController

  • public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
    Will parse/decode the CSMessage which present the answer of the GUI request, and will send the answer to the correct GUI. Also, will be controller of the System data: DataBase information, Server information etc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean dbConnected 
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_HOST
      The default host of the server
      static int DEFAULT_PORT
      The default port of the server

    • Method Detail

      • parseMessage

        public static void parseMessage(CSMessage csMsg)
        Analyzes the csMsg and calling to the suitable function which parse and send the respond to the correct GUI
        Parameters:
        csMsg - the respond of the Server to the Client's request

      • connectToServer

        public static void connectToServer()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Looking for the .txt file at projectPath+serTxtPath path, and will take the data from there. If not found or invalid data, the system will try to connect by DEFAULT_HOST and DEFAULT_PORT.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - when the data in the .txt file is wrong, or the file couldn't be found

      • connectToServer

        public static void connectToServer(java.lang.String host,
                                   int port)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Trying to connect into server at (host,port). If succeeded will change the .txt file at projectPath+serTxtPath path. If not, the system will try to connect by DEFAULT_HOST and DEFAULT_PORT.
        Parameters:
        host - - new DEFAULT_HOST of the Server trying to connect to
        port - - new DEFAULT_PORT of the Server trying to connect to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - when the data in the .txt file is wrong, or the file couldn't be found
